name: Chickometry
description:
Chickometry is a short puzzle experience that was created over the course of 3 months as a student project. The main theme of the game involves abstraction and how to utilize it as a game mechanic.

In Chickometry, you play as a game developer who was in the process of making a game but due to unfortunate circumstances involving his pet chicken Gudrun, he was sucked into his own unfinished game and now has to deal with the consequences.

Controls

w a s d - movement

space - jump

E - interact

F - throw objects

Esc - return to menu
